item.title: Dick Durbin Has Walked The Earth For 80 Years And Never Heard The Word ‘Wrongthink’
item.description: Sen. Dick Durbin, directly quoting Ben Weingarten in The Federalist, claimed he did not know the meaning of "wrongthink."

item.title: Democrat Cites Amy Coney Barrett To Back False Claims About Federal Censorship
item.description: Democrats are able to play dumb about the censorship-industrial complex in part because Barrett's decision gives them the ammunition to claim it doesn...

item.title: Hemingway To Dem: You Play Dumb About The Censorship-Industrial Complex Because It Works For Your Party
item.description: ‘In part, because you can rely on the censorship-industrial complex to do the work for you,’ Hemingway retorted.

item.title: ‘Free Speech’ Group Forces Taxpayer-Funded Texas University To Feature Trans Sex Shows
item.description: A judge is forcing Texas A&M University to host explicit drag shows on campus after the Foundation for Individual Rights and Expression sued.

item.title: Mollie Hemingway Delivers Masterclass Explainer On The ‘Government-Funded’ War On Free Speech
item.description: 'They know our voice is so powerful and influential that they can’t accomplish their goals unless they shut us down. They will not succeed.'
